Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/31st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted SB: Kedzie, 31st, 1-55 Expwy and Kedzie; NB: Kedzie, I-55 Expwy, California and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kedzie/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 31st, 1-55 Expressway and Kedzie.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, I-55 Expressway, California and Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
